org.apache.hadoop.hdfs.protocol.datatransfer

Interface ReplaceDatanodeOnFailure.Condition

  • Enclosing class:
    ReplaceDatanodeOnFailure

    private static interface ReplaceDatanodeOnFailure.Condition
    Datanode replacement condition

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static ReplaceDatanodeOnFailure.Condition DEFAULT
      DEFAULT condition: Let r be the replication number.
      static ReplaceDatanodeOnFailure.Condition FALSE
      Return false unconditionally.
      static ReplaceDatanodeOnFailure.Condition TRUE
      Return true unconditionally.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean satisfy(short replication, DatanodeInfo[] existings, int nExistings, boolean isAppend, boolean isHflushed)
      Is the condition satisfied?

    • Field Detail

      • TRUE

        static final ReplaceDatanodeOnFailure.Condition TRUE
        Return true unconditionally.

      • FALSE

        static final ReplaceDatanodeOnFailure.Condition FALSE
        Return false unconditionally.

      • DEFAULT

        static final ReplaceDatanodeOnFailure.Condition DEFAULT
        DEFAULT condition: Let r be the replication number. Let n be the number of existing datanodes. Add a new datanode only if r >= 3 and either (1) floor(r/2) >= n; or (2) r > n and the block is hflushed/appended.

    • Method Detail

      • satisfy

        boolean satisfy(short replication,
              DatanodeInfo[] existings,
              int nExistings,
              boolean isAppend,
              boolean isHflushed)
        Is the condition satisfied?
